columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Time instant at which the order was updated.

columns.name: UPDATE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Action taken on the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Added


Deleted


Post-release modify


Pre-release start time change


Free text sig changed


Unsigned


External order added


Dose change


Other order change


AUC - Target AUC change


AUC - GFR source change


AUC - CrCl formula change


AUC - GFR order-specific value change


AUC - sCr source change


AUC - sCr order-specific value change


ERX replaced by Medication Replacer


Maximum BSA Change


AUC - Use AUC Dose


Conversion Status - Set to Unspecified


Conversion Status - Set to Kept


Conversion Status - Set to Removed


Conversion Status - Set to Replaced


Conversion Status - Set to Replacement


Pharmacy Changed


Sig Type Changed


Scheduling Evaluated

columns.name: UPDATE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for updating the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Order created with treatment plan


Initial Value


Deferred


Order created for plan conversion


Build updated

columns.name: UPDATE_COMMENT
columns.description: Any additional comment for the updating the order.

columns.name: UPDATE_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the value of the item that changed (e.g. free text sig, start time) in the order.

columns.name: UPDATE_ORDER_ID
columns.description: This item contains the ID of the order that this action refers to.

columns.name: SOURCE_OTP_ID
columns.description: Holds the order template ID that is the source for this audit line.
